parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets text of given menu strip entry.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuSetText]] [idc, path, text]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuSetText]] [path, text]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>_ctrlMenuStrip [[menuSetText]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>0,0,1], "Hello World!"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[menuText]]
</value></part></template>
